GitStats is a minimalist browser tool designed to keep you motivated by displaying your GitHub contribution stats in real-time every time you open a new tab. Whether you're working on personal projects or collaborating with teams, GitStats gives you an effortless way to track your progress, celebrate milestones, and stay driven to code every day.

- Select a date range to compare your current progress with past contributions.
- View your best contribution day and see how it stacks up against your overall activity.
- Track your current contribution streak and longest streak, so you can stay on top of your goals.

ðŸ™Œ Healthy competition ðŸ™Œ
- Add users you want to compare with to see their contribution history.
- Stay motivated by friendly competition and keep pushing yourself to reach new heights. It's a great way to stay focused and keep improving.

Privacy
We respect your privacy. GitStats does not collect any personal information from users of the free version. All your data is stored locally on your device or in Chromeâ€™s storage, and only you have access to it. If you decide to upgrade to the Pro version, we only collect Google account information and payment details to process your purchase and provide premium features.
